name: THE STARS ARE TOO HIGH
description:
You have one goal, reaching the stars. 

You don't care if you have to go through the backrooms themselves, or the underworld.

You don't care how many times you have to painfully die.

Your goal is worth every second you spend seeking it out.

THE STARS ARE TOO HIGH is a game about reaching the stars or the 100+ endings (not implemented yet).

Deformed entities of the backrooms want to tear your body apart, to fight through, and clear the "levels" ,  you'll pickup items, that enhance you, give you powers, and make the backrooms, more survivable, and with a battle system based on your own weakness, it's going to be hard.

You might get really powerful items on one run, or really cringe items on the next. All items are randomized.

I guess that's a rougelike element.

Minor Horror Elements.

Secrets.

I dunno, cool stuff?

Now that's out the way, I'll polish this up once I've gotten some sleep.

Made for RPGMakerMZ Touch the Stars Jam
